page.title: 05Village Hall, Llangybi
page.content: Other regular user of Llangybi Village Hall are {The Women's Institute }which meets on the second Thursday evening of every month.The thirty members enjoy talks,demonstrations and quizes and take part in many County activities. The Parochial Church Council,Llangybi Fawr Community Council,Then Pony Club and Llangybi Hunt hold regular meetings and the hall is also used for children's parties,the youth club panto,church fete,jumble sales and elections.There is an organized play scheme in the summer holiday. Llantrisant unfortunatly has no village hall and their Womens's Institute,Parodical Church Council and Community Council have to meet in the nearby Hall at Tredunnock
